## Using git 

git is a command line version control system. We can use it from RStudio (via the "git pane" in the upper left) or from the command line (i.e. in the "Terminal Tab" ) 


The steps to using git involve:

- Initiate git repository 
    git init
    or click the little box in RStudio
    
- Do your work (same as ever)
    add files
    edit files
    save files
    
- **Add files you care about to the "stage"**
    git add yourfilename 
    git add . (to add everything)
    click to add to "stage" in RStudio
    
- **Commit your changes**
    git commit -m "your message"
    click "commit" button in RStudios
